name: SetNewBlogPrimaryLanguage
description:
Set a new primary language for blogs.

This tool is used to update the primary language for multi-language blog settings in HubSpot CMS. It should be called when there is a need to change the default language for blogs.

parameters.name: primary_language_object_id
parameters.description: ID of the blog object to set as primary in the multi-language group.

value_schema.description: ID of object to set as primary in multi-language group.
